version.releaseNotes:
This release includes several bug fixes in the Polyphony libraries which impacted browsing of logs by admins and some spurious access of pages by search engine spiders.
As well, this release includes a change to the way assets are created in order to streamline the process and prevent confusion.
version.change: AssetCreation: The asset creation process has been streamlined to allow easier creation of assets from files.

version.releaseNotes:
As of this release, Concerto no longer supports PHP4. Please use PHP 5.2 or later.
Concerto requires PHP 5.2 or later and either a MySQL 5.0 or later database or a PostgreSQL database.
For upgrades from prior versions of concerto, please point your browser at the harmoni database updater and run each of the updates. The updates are safe to run multiple times as they will only take action where needed. The updater is found at concerto/main/harmoni/core/DBHandler/db_updater.php
version.important: As of this version, Concerto no longer supports PHP4. Please use PHP5 or later.
version.change: Removing ampersands for compatability with other PHP5 code. The BBEdit-grep string used for the find and replace was: (function )&|(=\s?)&([^a-z#])|([^&])&\s?(\$) replaced with \1\2\3\4\5
version.fix: Now using an empty default cookie domain to better work out of the box.
Periods in schema ids were breaking schema selection form fields.
Converting all short tags (<?) to the full tags (<?php) for compatibility with more PHP configurations.
version.new: Support for repositories other than the HarmoniRepository, including those that do not support the full range of read and write functions.
version.change: CollectionsBrowse: now checking collection-level authorizations only, not traversing down into assets as this was taking WAY too long with large data sets.
version.fix: Fixing a number of E_STRICT notices and improving the class and interface hierarchies.
AssetBrowse: Checkboxes now work with ids containing periods.
version.change: Now includes new-style SQL install process and support for PostgreSQL.
version.new: OAI: New oai.php entry point in application root directory.
version.fix: OAI: Now supports the new SimpleTableRepository.
version.change: Documented PEAR::DB dependency in OAI provider.
Documented PEAR::Archive_Tar dependency.
Documented ImageMagick dependency.
version.fix: Wizard links are now working in the Edit Slideshow Wizard.
Wizard links now do not bypass PHP field validation.
Asset Editing UI now returns to the previous page on save or cancel.

Asset parents now showing in sidebar hierarchy.
ConcertoMenugenerator::addFirstParents() was missing an ampersand that forces passing of the array parameter by reference.

Slideshows: Now when browsing child assets, clicking on the thumbnail loads the same viewer URL as the 'view' button.
Unified printing of asset-browsing slideshow URLs.
version.change: Moving installer scripts into concerto/main/install
version.fix: Asset and Slideshow options panels now work in IE. Need to explicitly add tbody elements to tables.
Slideshows: Spaces in the window-name parameter to the window.open() function were preventing some slideshow windows from opening when clicked on.
Fixed a few bugs that prevented Concerto from running in PHP 5.

version.new: OAI: Added Open Archives Initiative (OAI) provider support to Concerto.
Updates: Added an updater system.
version.change: Schemas: Updating Dublin Core and VRA ids to be static strings.
AssetView: Now escaping content and placing it in a text-area so that it doesn't stretch the page.
Asset Browsing: Asset options/commands are now placed in a pop-up panel to save space and provide easy access to them.
Wizards: Now steps can be accessed out-of-order via links.
Importing: Can now import Assets directly under another Asset rather than just at the Repository root.
Importing: Can now import a single file as an Asset, without compression.
version.fix: Asset Editing: Parent Asset menu is now more workable with hierarchies of large numbers of Assets.
version.change: Asset Editing: Removed unused date fields to prevent user confusion.
version.new: Slideshows: Can now duplicate slideshows to easily make derivatives.
version.change: Slideshows: Most recently browsed collection and asset are maintained in the menu when going back to edit a slideshow, eliminating the need for much 'drilling-down'.
version.fix: Slideshows: Fixed an id conflict when going back to a slideshow a second time (from browsing an asset).

version.new: AuthN: Added support for administrators to act as another user.
Files: Added support for files stored at remote locations.
Exporting: Now shows status of the export.
Importing: Exif importing method now has a default Dublin Core / VRA Core schema, so collections that use Dublin Core/VRA Core will not need to include a schema.xml file when importing images.
Changelog: Changelog view now displays Polyphony and Harmoni changelogs.
version.fix: Exporting: Temporary files are now removed after they are used.
Importing: Temporary files are now removed after they are used.
Importing: Can now do xml imports that are in multiple directories and subdirectories.
Thumbnails: Can now determine if a thumbnail is real or an icon. Added borders around thumbnails.
Thumbnails: Fixed spacing in Browse child Assets view.
AssetBrowsing: Fixed ordering in Browse child Assets view.
Documentation: Updated documentation for importing images with EXIF/IPTC metadata.

version.important: Concerto 2.2.0 is a merging of Concerto 2.1.13 with work done on the Concerto trunk by Tim and John over the summer. The additions on the trunk include configurations and admin interfaces for the CourseManagement and Scheduling OSIDs and for GUI-theme-management.
version.new: Admin interface for managing themes.
Admin interface for managing courses.

version.fix: Exhibitions: Now Slideshow order is properly maintained when deleting slideshows.
version.new: AuthZ: Added icon and popup display of Authorizations.
version.fix: Tagging: Fixed IE javascript errors.

version.new: Tagging: Added support for Tagging.
version.fix: Collections: Now checks authZ before showing collections in the list.
Collections: The collection id was being dropped when viewing assets directly.
Collections: Now checks authZ before showing collections in the list.
AssetEditing/AssetDeleting: Multiple ID parsing now properly differentiates between empty whitespace and valid id strings.
version.change: Polyphony icons have now been moved to their own directory for easier access when keeping polyphony installed in a non-web-accessible directory.
SimpleThemeBlack: The image path is now configurable to allow for Concerto installation outside of a web-accessible directory.

version.fix: Dates: Prettier printing of dates.
AssetImporting: Fixed up text to clarify that the user should import a Zip/GZip/Tar archive.
Thumbnails: Now if Image Magick barfs on some multi-page PDFs and generates a single black pixel as a thumbnail, it won't be saved and the nice default icon will be used instead.

version.new: Exhibitions: Can now reorder slideshows in exhibitions.
version.change: RSS: RSS links now in head of document to alert the browser (specifically FireFox) of the availability of feeds.
Slideshows: Number of slides now appears below title and doesn't wrap.
Config: Harmoni, Polyphony, and Viewer locations are now specified as the release-defaults, easing the release process. Harmoni/Polyphony locations are now specified in a config.

version.fix: RSS: Added publication dates for slideshow RSS items.
Slideshows: Removed debugging line in slideshow browse mode.
Slideshows: now displays an appropriate message if target media have been deleted.
Slideshows: Now does't crash exhibition browsing if target media are missing.
Now does't wrap the checkboxes in Collection browsing when the asset-browse link is present.
version.new: Authenticated RSS feeds of most recently added/edited assets.
Authenticated RSS feeds of most recently added/edited slideshows.
Authenticated RSS feeds of logs.
version.fix: Now forces cookie usage to prevent accidental or intentional session hijacking by the passing of session ids in the url.
Now doesn't force a redirect after checking for tables, allowing HTTP authentication to work on the first pageload.
Fixes in Harmoni and Polyphony. See their changelogs for more details.
Selection: Can now view selection contents in viewer.
Menus: Now provides a link back to the current collection/asset when viewing the selection.
AssetDeleting: Now doesn't crash when deleting Assets from withing the child Asset browsing screen.
AssetEditing: Now can handle unentered values (specifically dates) that return null rather than a valid primitive object.
Slideshows: Clarifying metadata option.
Deleting: Now prompts twice to confirm delete of Collections and Exhibitions.
AssetDeleting: Now doesn't crash when deleting Assets from withing the Asset details screen. It was trying to return to the details for the newly non-existant asset.
Fixes in Harmoni, Polyphony, and the Viewer. See their changelogs for more details.

version.new: Importing: New 'Files-Only' importing method
version.fix: AssetEditing-Files: Now doesn't create a thumbnail if conversion fails.
AssetEditing-Files: Renamed button label.
AssetEditing-Files: Optional values are now (properly) unchecked.
AssetCreation: Now uses a SelectOrNew with some default types for the asset type.
UI flow: Now returns to browsing when checked assets are delete/edited.
Importing: Fixed cacheName problem when authenticated via LDAP.
CollectionEditing: Now has a larger box for description.
CollectionBrowsing: Now allows a longer description.
AssetEditing: Fixed issue where selecting too many assets to edit (~50) overflowed the allowed length of the session array key, preventing the editing of many assets at once.
AssetEditing: Fixed issue where single-valued parts were not able to be added properly in the multi-edit wizard, causing a fatal error.
Schemas: Fixed a missing variable that was preventing duplication of local schemas.
Normalized case in edit/delete links.
version.new: AssetBrowsing: Checkbox now enabled even if the user doesn't have authorization to modify the asset, allowing it to be checked for addition to the selection.
AssetDetails: Now prints Modification/Creation dates.
version.fix: URLs specifying parameters now continue through first access attempt where install is checked.
version.change: AssetEditing: DisplayNames are now NOT required for Assets.
version.new: AssetEditing: SchemaField descriptions are now available in the asset editing interface.
version.change: AssetEditing: Add/Remove buttons for Records and repeatable Values are now better labeled.
version.new: AssetEditing: Thumbnails of currently edited assets are now displayed in asset editing interfaces.
version.fix: AssetEditing: The FILE record structure [schema] now respects the order in the Asset Editing interface.
Collection.Delete: Now selects the display name BEFORE deleting the repository.
CollectionCreating: The FILE record structure is now added by default.
Collection.Edit: Fixed extra space that was messing up the select lists.
version.new: Schemas: Known SchemaField data types are now ordered and have descriptions.
version.change: Schemas: Now uses StatusStars for conversion operations.
Schemas: Now return to the schema step of collection editing if needed.
Schemas: AuthoritativeValues addition is now an AuthorizationFunction.

Schemas: Added support for Schema/RecordStructure/Record duplication.
Schemas: Adding support for Schema/RecordStructure deleting.
Schemas: Schema Editing can now be accessed from the Collection.Edit wizard and from the Collection links.

Schemas: Repeatable flag can now only be changed from false to true.
Schemas: Updated the Schema creation wizard to support Authoratiative Lists.
version.new: Schemas: New installs now have Dublin Core and VRA Core defined by default.
version.change: Slideshows are now using the outline-xml/slide-xml ajax loading paradigm rather than putting all slide info in one giant slideshow-xml file.
version.fix: Logging: Ensured that logging is now ready for use before attempting to log errors.
Theme: improved the look of headings, added more heading/menu levels.
version.new: Added user documentation.
version.change: Display: The version and copyright year are now dynamically pulled from the changelog.

version.fix: Now can remove empty part values.

Adding 'currently open slideshows' to main menu.
